text:
Hi
is there anyone who can help me to solve this navigation problem on our Blog-list-page?
- it stating from "0" whereas it should start from "1"
- I have also set 5 "li" in a page but in this first page it shows only 4

Are you on the template preview page?
I’ve found the preview page set’s it to 0
Once I publish the numbers start from 1
It’s quite annoying because it throws all the logic off

<@UDJV5B73R>
Oh .. you are right. I was in the preview page.
that means everything is fine.
Thank you so much for your helpful answer.

What’s the best way to create multiple LPs from the same template? So I downloaded a free template from the marketplace. I made a landing page from the that template and went into `settings > advanced > edit template`. This edits the master template so I can’t make more landing pages off the original template that I downloaded. Should I clone the template folder and rename all the files and then edit that? I just want to shift some things around and use our own branding styles.

I would clone the folder and work off the clone. Regarding making multiple landing pages - if you truly mean just the pages, then that you do through the landing page dashboard(similar to the website pages dashboard)
